summary: This document appears to be a series of bank statements or transaction records from an account, spanning from September 2012 to July 2014. It records at least two large wire transfers from Leon D. Black, totaling $205,030.00, into the account.

persons.name: Leon D. Black
persons.context: Individual who sent two large wire transfers ($60,000.00 and $145,030.00) to the account referenced in these financial records.

events.title: Wire Transfer from Leon D. Black

keyFacts: The document is a financial record showing transactions from September 2012 to July 2014.
Two substantial wire transfers from Leon D. Black are recorded: $60,000.00 on or around September 30, 2012, and $145,030.00 on July 25, 2013.
The total amount transferred from Leon D. Black during this period was $205,030.00.
The document is part of a larger set of records, as indicated by the EFTA reference numbers and pagination.
